./model/rose.class.splitter.pl

   1 #!/usr/bin/perl -w
   2 use strict;
   3 
   4 while(<>) { 
   5     if (/^package/) { 
   6         close FILE;
   7         my @line = split(/ /, $_);
   8         my @packages = split(/:/, $line[1]);
   9         chomp($packages[-1]); # remove newline
  10         chop($packages[-1]);  # remove ;
  11         my $path = "";
  12         for my $package (@packages[0..$#packages-1]) {
  13             # create a directory if one doesn't exist
  14             $path .= "$package/";
  15             mkdir $path unless ( -e $path );
  16         }
  17         open FILE, ">", "${path}/${packages[-1]}.pm";
  18     }
  19 print FILE unless /########/;
  20 }
